channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Still flooded, 17th February
item.description:
Stop marking cases as addressed. They haven't been addressed. Still a lake and dangerous to drive through. Sort it out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Huge, Deep, unavoidable pothole, 120cm long, atleast 125mm deep. Which blew my tyre and completely cracked my entire Wheel. Reference to the previous report number: 8921041 who mentions myself as hitting the same hole 5 minutes after him. We spoke at the roadside both waiting for Breakdown recovery. This had to be fixed asap!, 17th February
item.description:

item.title: Extended pothole middle of one way road, 17th February
item.description:
Directly outside 37 Sandford Mill Road. The Lorries are bottoming out in it and our house is shaking.it has been happening for about a week now and is affecting our sleep

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Sandford Mill Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
